document.full_text: along with his father and his brother, mr. stumberg founded patio foods, distributing frozen tamales, burritos and enchiladas nationwide.
document.title: louis stumberg, who brought tex-mex to tv dinners, dies at 87
lines_and_colors: along with his father and his brother, mr. stumberg founded patio foods, distributing frozen tamales, burritos and enchiladas nationwide.
